description.text: You got the$(red) kangaroo meat and hide$()?

Ahh... so this is what kangaroo is like. A tender piece of meat indeed... The hide on the other hand isn't as good as the regular leather we use. A good trophy though... Thanks a lot adventurer. I don't have much to give you... Here, take these beef slices. The carcass just came in today so it's fresh!
